creator: osaint-yves@noos.fr
text:
<fo:page-number-citation etc..> don't use the format define in <fo:page-sequence
master-reference="myPage" format="00">

fo:page-number-citation display 1 even if it refer to page correctly displayed 01

OS : Win2k sp2, Linux RH 7.2 Mdk 8.2 (both PC) and MacOsX 10.1.3
Fixed in cvs, now it displays 01.
